The platform not only provides analysis based on fundamental analysis but also provides justifications for better decision-making. It is available as a cloud platform as well as Data API to integrate it into an existing system. It was a part of Launch Chapel Hill accelerator.

TRM provides risk and compliance management solution for crypto companies. Offers a solution that automatically detects & reports suspicious activity. It allows companies to launch KYC identify verification and build compliant airdrops. It automatically blends on-chain and off-chain data and provides information about the token holders.

Based in NYC, trueEX is an electronic execution platform for the global interest rate swaps (IRS) market. trueEX will initially serve the $300 trillion global interest rate swaps (IRS) market and expand into other liquid derivatives as appropriate. Interest rate swaps are currently traded largely over the phone, without regulatory oversight, pre-trade or post-trade transparency, and with very little automation. The trueEX electronic exchange has been designed to serve the needs of both market makers as well as asset managers, hedge funds and other buy-side firms.

Clusters: Cash, Payments & Banking As a Service
Service/Product Description: TrueLayer offers developers an easy way to access the bank data they need to build financial apps and services, helping startups and banks alike to drive products in financial services. TrueLayer supports account verification, KYC processes, and transactional data for account aggregation, credit scoring and risk assessment.

Truelytics is a self-service business intelligence platform catering to the wealth management industry. It enables financial advisors and wealth managers to monitor and manage their portfolio performance. Provides benchmark tools to compare performance against their peers. The monthly subscription of the platform costs $99.

TruMid is a trading platform focused on fixed income securities and corporate bonds. It a cloud-based platform using AWS for trading activities. Allows users to select orders, execute trades based on current prices, and manage workflows, and access insights using data science APIs and algorithms. The application can be accessed on Windows devices.

Trussle is a free online mortgage broker that's making mortgages fairer for everyone. Trussle has taken the mortgage process online, removing the time, hassle and costs involved in securing a mortgage. Trussle is completely free for customers and receives a fee from the lender once the mortgage was completed. Trussle is a trading style of Trussle Lab Ltd, which is an appointed representative of Mortgage Advice Bureau Limited and Mortgage Advice Bureau (Derby) Limited which is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.

Twisto has over 600k users and 100k app and card clients across the Czech Republic and Poland. The business is the daily payments app of choice for its users, providing buy-now, pay later capabilities, including fully flexible instalment financing. Twisto offers users a seamless point-of-sale experience with merchants, delivers one-click bill and invoice payments, offers the best FX rates, travel insurance and a comprehensive PFM in one app. A primary Mastercard issuer and is directly integrated into ApplePay

Udu is a platform offering private equity deal sourcing and management solutions. Users can customise their search and define good and bad matches on the platform. Using the analytics software, it is able to identify & assign ranks to private & public data and improve conversion rates.

UiPath is a New York-based, robotic process automation (RPA) company that delivers free and open training and collaboration and enables robots to learn new skills through AI and machine learning. The technology is used by thousands of companies, particularly in document management, contact center, healthcare, finance and accounting, human resources, and supply chains, addressing major technical challenges, including data extraction and migration, process automation, application integration, and business process outsourcing.

Ummeed Housing Finance is a housing finance company that provides home loans and loan against property to lower and middle income families. The company aims to help people with informal incomes, who have limited access to organized finance and who constitute significant portion of the Indian population. Ummeed Housing Finance's services include issuance of home loans and loan against property to improve operational efficiency and reduce turnaround time for customers, enabling low and middle income households to get access to affordable housing loans in an innovative and personalized manner.

Uncapped is a platform offering finance solutions to businesses. It allows users to connect their sales and marketing accounts and select offers based on repayment rates and deducts a % of every new sale until the balance is repaid. Includes no interest or equity charges in return.

Unqork is a no-code enterprise application platform that helps large companies build, deploy, and manage complex applications.  The company's platform allows users to build, deploy, and manage complex applications without writing a single line of code and streamlines product sales process to improve customer experience, enabling large companies to build complex custom software faster with higher quality, and lower costs than conventional approaches. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in New York.

Utocat provides an application development platform and an asset management platform for banks and insurance companies. Offers Catalizr, that enables digital management of unlisted securities. The company offers an API named Blockchainiz, that can be used for building decentralized apps for automating processes, KYC procedures and for automatically executing contractual clauses.

Vakt is a blockchain-based post-trade settlement platform. Counterparty communications are secured and linked directly to the relevant transaction, using blockchain technology. Trade finance is digitalized with an integrated banking marketplace.

Vega Protocol provides a blockchain network for financial services. It provides a decentralized infrastructure to develop and automate financial products & services. It features cross-chain settlements, trading nodes, on-chain collateral management, etc
Versive develops a software-only cybersecurity solution. The Versive Security Engine discovers and makes sense of ongoing adversary campaigns inside corporate networks.

Vestwell is a digital platform that makes it easier to offer and administer 401(k) plans. Vestwell removes traditional friction points through seamless plan design, automated onboarding, streamlined administration, and flexible investment strategies, all at competitive pricing. By acting as a single point of contact, Vestwell has modernized the retirement offering while keeping the plan sponsor's and plan participant's best interests in mind. The company was founded in 2016 and based in New York, New York.

Very Good Security provides data security and compliance products and services to an enterprise. Products include VGS Vault, a multi-factor authentication based secure data storage; VGS Compliance, a compliance certification, and audit; reporting consulting package; Secure Veriforms, a secure form to capture sensitive data accessible via browser and mobile applications; and VGS Proxy, a data redaction and enrichment based token for anonymized big data processing. Pricing starts at $1.2k/month for 2.5GB bandwidth to the startup for proxy, and tokenization plans are based on the number of tokens created per year.

Visible Alpha provides a data analytics and research platform to financial institutions. It also includes comparable forecast models and financial data from leading equity analysts. The research data it covers include P&L statements, balance sheets, cash flow statements, product-level sales, pricing and margins, segmented financial forecasts, geographic breakdowns, operation metrics and expense models.

Visible is a software for sharing, management, and reporting of data between startups and investors. Helps in  tracking investment performance and managing communications between startups and investors. Helps investors track and report on the performance of their individual and aggregate investments (including angel, seed, VC, and private equity funds). Also provides founders with tools that simplify investor communication, capitalization table management, and ongoing performance tracking.

Clusters: Cash, Payments & Banking As a Service
Service/Product Description: Viva Payments provides payment processing solutions to businesses. It offers an app-based wallet, hardware-based terminals, which can be used for accepting online/offline payments. It also offers debit cards for consumer & business payments. App is available on iOS & Android devices.

VoxSmart develops the solution VSmart which is a proprietary and patented mobile technology developed to capture, record, store, transcribe and analyze all your mobile calls, messages and voicemail using one platform. The solution is handset agnostic and mobile network independent and used to achieve regulatory and internal compliance. The solution helps companies adhere to mandatory global regulatory regimes such as FCA COBS 11.8, MiFID II Article 16 and Dodd-Frank Title VII.

W2 Global Data is a provider of structured international data, software, and services, helping clients to make decisions about the people and organizations they are interacting with through web-based online screening tools. Its product range includes SAVI, a real time AML and customer due diligence tracker; KYCchecker, enabling real-time ID verification of consumer and corporate customers around the globe; AMLchecker enabling verification of UK customers in line with the latest EU Money Laundering Directive; BSMART, enables to stay up to date by continuously cross-referencing database against a number of datasets; and Liveboat, a stand-alone, completely self-sufficient KYC service that runs autonomously from any of our other services, even operating from a disparate, ring-fenced remote hosting centre. Apart from financial institutions, they also provide services to retail, security, real estate and few other sectors.

Clusters: Cash, Payments & Banking As a Service
Service/Product Description: Wave makes running a small business better by providing free accounting, invoicing, affordable credit card processing (payments) and payroll. Over 3 million small business owners, in more than 200 countries around the world, rely on WaveApps to run their business. Wave is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

WealthForge automates private placements making it more efficient for private entities to secure capital. The company provides an integrated solution for risk management, standardized processing and automated technology for issuers, broker-dealers and other intermediaries who are raising private capital.

Wintermute is a threat intelligence solutions provider. It also offers liquidity solutions and market makers for cryptocurrencies. It features proprietary algorithms to provide for bids, offers and exchange kiosks to make money. Also, offers tools for managing security & risk assessment solutions for traders.

WorkFusion is accelerating the worlds transition to more meaningful work. Our Intelligent Automation solutions are powered by pre-trained ExpertBots, proprietary artificial intelligence technology and advanced analytics, working together to automate a wide range of business processes. The worlds leading organizations use WorkFusion to automate their operations with ease and speed, helping them up-skill employees, reduce costs and unlock growth like never before.

Xena Exchange is a cryptocurrency trading platform. Allows users to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ether, and other cryptocurrencies. Provides AI studies and signals within the trading terminal. Offers multiple order types such as stop loss, take profit and trailing stop orders, etc. Provides real-time trading with market data web socket and FIX APIs. Also offers colocation services and portfolio management services. Charges 0.03% taker’s fee and -0.03% maker’s rebate.

XM Cyber provides a fully automated APT Simulation Platform to continuously expose all attack vectors, above and below the surface, from breach point to any organizational critical asset. This continuous loop of automated red teaming is completed by ongoing and prioritized actionable remediation of organizations security gaps. In effect, HaXM by XM Cyber operates as an automated purple team that fluidly combines red team and blue team processes to ensure that organizations are always one step ahead of the hacker.

Zabo provides a cryptocurrency banking platform. Offers bank accounts and debit cards linked to the account. Users can set Zabo Allocation Plan and get paid in Bitcoin from the regular paychecks. Users can buy, sell and transfer cryptocurrency. Provides hardware wallet support and supports Bitcoin & Ethereum.

Zanbato offers a platform that facilitates private placement workflows and connectivity in private securities markets. The company's private-label platforms are used by Broker-Dealers, Fund Managers, Private Wealth Managers, and Co-Investment Networks to manage the distribution and placement of private offerings to their clients, who include large institutional allocators such as Sovereign Wealth Funds, Foundation/Endowments, and Pensions, as well as Family Offices and High Net Worth Individuals.
Zecco is a financial community offering free stock trades and various tools for investors.

Zero Hash offers settlement & risk-management solutions for fiat & digital assets. It provides tools and APIs to assist in managing post-trade, regulatory compliance, liquidity, and custody solutions for users.

Zest offers an online platform to consumers for point-of-sale financing. It enables users to pay the amount of product in installments at the time of online purchase. It facilitates early payments of installments. It provides financing on the basis of bank statements. Users can avail the financing by completing KYC on the portal.

Zhong An Online is a Chinese property insurance company that sells all its products online along with handling claims. The company offers e-commerce, mobile payment, and financing guarantee for internet businesses and users. Founded in 2013, Zhong An Online offers business opportunities covering various areas, including the internet-based business and household property insurance, cargo insurance, liability insurance, and credit insurance.

Zirra provides investors with the tools they need to invest successfully in private companies. The platform collects and assembles information from multiple public sources. the platform also generates proprietary and exclusive new data through targeted crowd analysis. Also provide sentiment analysis using machine learning. Compute metrics and ratings, enabling meaningful comparisons.  Also has analysts to curate the data and add exclusive insights.

Zopa is a P2P platform for personal loans. It enables borrowers to avail of loans from multiple lenders or investors. It also provides a credit card for online/offline purchases. It offers an app-based platform that is available on iOS & Android devices.
